LanguageData.STF.ForbidWhenMovingTT: Will forbid any item that floats away from a stockpile that allows the item. This will stop pawns from constantly try to return items that float away.
LanguageData.STF.RelativeFloatSpeedTT: A slower floating speed will cause item positions to change less frequently and lower the performance need for the mod.
LanguageData.STF.FloatUnderBridgesTT: Things will float under bridges, their texture being hidden during the path
LanguageData.STF.DownedPawnsFloatTT: Pawns that are downed will also float, but at a slower rate than corpses.
LanguageData.STF.DownedPawnsDrown: Downed pawns in non-shallow water can drown
LanguageData.STF.DownedPawnsDrownTT: Pawns that are downed in non-shallow water can drown. Helmets with the EVA-tag will prevent this.
LanguageData.STF.PawnsCanFall: Pawns can loose footing in moving water
LanguageData.STF.PawnsCanFallTT: There is a chance that pawns can slip in moving water and become downed for a little while. This scales with their manipulation-skill
LanguageData.STF.ManipulationThresholdTT: The manipulation value below witch pawns can loose their footing when walking in water
LanguageData.STF.RelativeChanceInShallowsTT: Chance of loosing footing in shallow waters is further limited by this setting. Shallow waters include all with "shallow" in the name or that can dry into something else, like Marsh.
LanguageData.STF.AllowOnStuckTT: Will automatically allow items that gets stuck in a net or blocked by bars
LanguageData.STF.DespawnAtMapEdgeTT: Floating things will despawn instead of being stopped by the map edge.
LanguageData.STF.SpawnNewItemsDisabled: Spawning of items is disabled in the mod-settings
LanguageData.STF.SpawnNewItemsTT: Things can spawn at the edge of the map if there is a river flowing.
LanguageData.STF.MaxSpawnValueTT: The maximum value of each stack of items spawned
LanguageData.STF.MinTimeBetweenItemsTT: The minimum time between things spawning in the river.
LanguageData.STF.ForbidSpawningItemsTT: Items spawning in the river will by default be forbidden
LanguageData.STF.HaulUrgently: Mark spawning items to be hauled urgently
LanguageData.STF.HaulUrgentlyTT: Items spawning in the river will by default be marked to be hauled urgently
LanguageData.STF.SpawnLivingPawnsTT: Living, but downed, pawns can spawn. You can choose to rescue them if you want.
LanguageData.STF.SpawnInOceanTilesTT: Things can also spawn in on edge-tiles of ocean type, no guarantees for it to stay on the map.
LanguageData.STF.NotifyOfSpawningItemsTT: Will show a message about anything spawning in the river
LanguageData.STF.ReservedItemsWillNotMoveTT: Will make items that are reserved to be used in a toil to stay still to not cause issues when working
LanguageData.STF.WarnForAllFriendlyPawnsTT: Will notify about any non-enemy drowning
LanguageData.STF.PawnIsFloatingAwayTT: {0} is downed and floating away in the water.
LanguageData.STF.ThingsUnderBridgeTT: Things that are currently floating under bridges: {0}
LanguageData.STF.PawnIsDrowning: {0} is downed in the water and drowning, they are in desperate need of rescue!
LanguageData.STF.PawnHasFallen: {0} has lost their footing in the flowing water!
LanguageData.STF.PawnHasFallenAndFloats: {0} has lost their footing in the flowing water and is now floating away!
LanguageData.STF.PawnIsLostMessage: You failed to rescue {0} from the flowing water and they have now floated out of sight. Hopefully they can save themselved but you may never see them again.
LanguageData.STF.PawnSpawnedTitle: Someone is struggeling in the river
LanguageData.STF.PawnSpawnedMessage: You notice someone in the water, they signal you for help
